Najah/Feline::

Najah heard the alarm and cursed, he was winning in his training with 
Repressor, he crepts toward the exit when he saw a LAdy Hwak talking 
with someone "Hey YOu!!! You musnt be in lab!!!" 

He screamed against Lady HAwk and he would have said more if Feline 
didn't appear in that moment.

"Stop Arge... We have to go a fight" she screamed

She transformed in BVeast mode and run towards Cybertron FIre. "The 
big-Reptilian will know this.. birdie so you should behave" amenaced 
the snake, he transformed to robot mode and showing his rockets flew 
followed at other Alliance members



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Repressor::
> 
> FZ looks at the Cybertronian Fire in the distance. Soon, there 
would 
> be battle.
> 
> "Alliance bots, spread out. When everyone is in position, we'll 
> attack," he orders over his comm, getting into position.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving FZ's orders, and taking the bot as Zardus, Perndabot gets 
> into position.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Astral, Starlight, Griplash, Fenox, and Recklessa spread out along 
> with the others, out of range of the Cybertronian Fire's defences.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Repressor speeds up, heading toward the CF.
